Text: are these english dubbed or subtitled?
These are DVD images so you can change language and subtitle options in the menu.
What should i use to open these files?
Stevie, they are DVD images.  You mount them in a virtual CD/DVD software such as Daemon Tools and play them as if they were real DVDs.

Graa, I can't download them because of a filesize limit (?)
I've seen this before, when I tried to download AMV Hell dvd off their site, and found out it was because of a problem with my Hard drive not having the right file system.  Long story short, I can't do anything above 4 gigs, and I have no idea how to partition my drive :( I'm using an external drive for this, so maybe it'll be easier (?) could someone give me some tips?
Thanks in advance

@SirKiyoshi

Symantec Partition Magic or EASEUS Partition Master will reformat any drive without removing the data. What you want is to reformat to NTFS file system.
